member.name: T:Sandbox.ModAPI.CustomControlGetDelegate

The list of actions for this block

member.name: T:Sandbox.ModAPI.IMyTerminalControls
member.summary: This interface allows you to query, add or remove terminal controls for a block. The terminal controls are the controls that appear in the terminal screen when you select a block. You may add new controls, remove existing controls, or modify existing controls.

member.name: M:Sandbox.ModAPI.IMyTerminalControls.GetControls``1(System.Collections.Generic.List{Sandbox.ModAPI.Interfaces.Terminal.IMyTerminalControl}@)
member.summary: Gets the controls associated with a block.
member.typeparam: This is the object builder type of the associated block you want to get terminal controls for
member.param: The list that contains the terminal controls for this block

member.name: M:Sandbox.ModAPI.IMyTerminalControls.AddControl``1(Sandbox.ModAPI.Interfaces.Terminal.IMyTerminalControl)
member.summary: Adds a terminal control to a block.
member.typeparam: This is the ModAPI interface of the associated block you want to add a terminal control to
member.param: This is the control you're adding, created with CreateControl or CreateProperty

member.name: M:Sandbox.ModAPI.IMyTerminalControls.RemoveControl``1(Sandbox.ModAPI.Interfaces.Terminal.IMyTerminalControl)
member.summary: Removes a terminal control from a block.
member.typeparam: This is the ModAPI interface of the associated block you want to remove a terminal control from
member.param: This is the control you're removing. Use GetControls to get the item itself.

member.name: M:Sandbox.ModAPI.IMyTerminalControls.CreateControl``2(System.String)
member.summary: This creates a control that can be added to a block.
member.typeparam: The type of control you're creating
The ModAPI interface of the associated block
member.param: A unique identifier for this control
member.returns: Returns an interface to the control you've created depending on TControl

member.name: M:Sandbox.ModAPI.IMyTerminalControls.CreateProperty``2(System.String)
member.summary: This creates a property that can be added to a block. A property is not visible on the terminal screen but can hold a value that can be used in programmable blocks.
member.typeparam: The type of property you're creating
The ModAPI interface of the associated block
member.param: A unique identifier for this property
member.returns: Returns an IMyTerminalControlProperty that can be added to a block via AddControl

member.name: M:Sandbox.ModAPI.IMyTerminalControls.GetActions``1(System.Collections.Generic.List{Sandbox.ModAPI.Interfaces.Terminal.IMyTerminalAction}@)
member.summary: This allows you to get all actions associated with this block.
member.typeparam: The ModAPI interface of the associated block
member.param: The list that contains the actions associated with this block

member.name: M:Sandbox.ModAPI.IMyTerminalControls.AddAction``1(Sandbox.ModAPI.Interfaces.Terminal.IMyTerminalAction)
member.summary: This allows you to add an action to an assocated block
member.typeparam: The ModAPI interface of the associated block
member.param: An IMyTerminalAction object returned from CreateAction

member.name: M:Sandbox.ModAPI.IMyTerminalControls.RemoveAction``1(Sandbox.ModAPI.Interfaces.Terminal.IMyTerminalAction)
member.summary: This allows you to remove an action from a block
member.typeparam: The ModAPI interface of the associated block

member.name: M:Sandbox.ModAPI.IMyTerminalControls.CreateAction``1(System.String)
member.summary: This allows you to create an action to associate with a block
member.typeparam: The ModAPI interface of the associated block
member.param: A unique identifier for this action

member.name: E:Sandbox.ModAPI.IMyTerminalControls.CustomControlGetter
member.summary: This event allows you to modify the list of controls that the game displays when a user selects a block. Each time terminal controls are enumerated for a block, this delegate is called, which allows you to modify the control list directly, and remove/add as you see fit before the controls are dispalyed. This is to allow fine grain control of the controls being displayed, so you can display only controls you want to in specific situations (like blocks with different subtypes, or even on specific blocks by entityId)

member.name: E:Sandbox.ModAPI.IMyTerminalControls.CustomActionGetter
member.summary: This event allows you to modify the list of actions available when a user wants to select an action for a block in the toolbar. Modifying the list in this event modifies the list displayed to the user so that you can customize it in specific situations (like blocks with different subtypes, or even on specific blocks by entityId)

member.name: F:Sandbox.ModAPI.Ingame.MyInventoryItemFilter.ItemId
member.summary: Specifies an item to filter. Set to true to only check the main type part of this ID.

member.summary: Suspension travel, value from 0 to 1.

member.name: F:Sandbox.ModAPI.Ingame.MyPlanetElevation.Surface
member.summary: Return the distance to the closest point of the planet. This is the same value displayed in the HUD.

member.summary: Gets the ship's linear velocity (motion).

member.name: F:Sandbox.ModAPI.Ingame.MyShipVelocities.AngularVelocity

member.name: M:Sandbox.ModAPI.Ingame.IMyTextPanel.GetSelectedImages(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String})
member.summary:
Outputs the selected image ids to the specified list.
NOTE: List is not cleared internally.

member.name: P:Sandbox.ModAPI.Ingame.IMyTextPanel.CurrentlyShownImage
member.summary:
The image that is currently shown on the screen.
Returns NULL if there are no images selected OR the screen is in text mode.

member.name: P:Sandbox.ModAPI.Ingame.IMyTextPanel.ShowOnScreen
member.summary: Indicates what should be shown on the screen, none being an image.

member.name: P:Sandbox.ModAPI.Ingame.IMyTextPanel.ShowText
member.summary: Returns true if the ShowOnScreen flag is set to either PUBLIC or PRIVATE

member.name: T:Sandbox.ModAPI.Ingame.PistonStatus

member.name: F:Sandbox.ModAPI.Ingame.PistonStatus.Stopped
member.summary: The piston velocity is 0 (stationary).

member.name: F:Sandbox.ModAPI.Ingame.PistonStatus.Extending
member.summary: The piston is being extended (moving).

member.name: F:Sandbox.ModAPI.Ingame.PistonStatus.Extended
member.summary: The piston is in its extended position (stationary).

member.name: F:Sandbox.ModAPI.Ingame.PistonStatus.Retracting
member.summary: The piston is being retracted (moving).

member.name: F:Sandbox.ModAPI.Ingame.PistonStatus.Retracted
member.summary: The piston is in its retracted position (stationary).

member.name: T:Sandbox.ModAPI.Ingame.MyGridProgram
member.summary: All programmable block scripts derive from this class, meaning that all properties in this class are directly available for use in your scripts. If you use Visual Studio or other external editors to write your scripts, you can derive directly from this class and have a compatible script template.

member.name: P:Sandbox.ModAPI.Ingame.MyGridProgram.GridTerminalSystem
member.summary: Provides access to the grid terminal system as viewed from this programmable block.

member.name: P:Sandbox.ModAPI.Ingame.MyGridProgram.Me
member.summary: Gets a reference to the currently running programmable block.

member.name: P:Sandbox.ModAPI.Ingame.MyGridProgram.ElapsedTime
member.summary: Gets the amount of in-game time elapsed from the previous run.

member.name: P:Sandbox.ModAPI.Ingame.MyGridProgram.Runtime
member.summary: Gets runtime information for the running grid program.

member.name: P:Sandbox.ModAPI.Ingame.MyGridProgram.Storage
member.summary: Allows you to store data between game sessions.

member.name: P:Sandbox.ModAPI.Ingame.MyGridProgram.Echo
member.summary: Prints out text onto the currently running programmable block's detail info area.

member.name: T:Sandbox.ModAPI.IMyScriptBlacklist
member.summary: Exposes blacklist functionality to allow mods to disallow parts of the scripting API that has been allowed by the system whitelist.

member.name: M:Sandbox.ModAPI.IMyScriptBlacklist.GetWhitelist
member.summary: Gets the entries that have been whitelisted by the system. Each entry may represent a whole namespace, a single type and all its members, or a single member of a type.

member.name: M:Sandbox.ModAPI.IMyScriptBlacklist.GetBlacklistedIngameEntries
member.summary: Gets the entries that have been blacklisted for the ingame scripts.

member.name: M:Sandbox.ModAPI.IMyScriptBlacklist.OpenIngameBlacklistBatch
member.summary: Opens a batch to add or remove members to the blacklist.

member.name: T:Sandbox.ModAPI.Interfaces.Terminal.IMyTerminalAction
member.summary: This is an interface wrapper for terminal actions that appear on a toolbar. An instance of this interface is created via MyAPIGateway.TerminalControls.CreateAction. Once created, you may modify various fields to control how the action behaves.

member.name: P:Sandbox.ModAPI.Interfaces.Terminal.IMyTerminalAction.Enabled
member.summary: Allows you to set if this action is enabled or disabled

member.name: P:Sandbox.ModAPI.Interfaces.Terminal.IMyTerminalAction.InvalidToolbarTypes
member.summary: Allows you to set which toolbar type this action is invalid for. Adding to this means this action may not be added to that toolbar type.

member.name: P:Sandbox.ModAPI.Interfaces.Terminal.IMyTerminalAction.ValidForGroups
member.summary: Allows you to set if this action is valid in groups

member.name: P:Sandbox.ModAPI.Interfaces.Terminal.IMyTerminalAction.Name
member.summary: Allows you to set the name of the Action

member.name: P:Sandbox.ModAPI.Interfaces.Terminal.IMyTerminalAction.Icon
member.summary: Allows you to set the Icon of this action. It's a link to an icon texture.

member.name: P:Sandbox.ModAPI.Interfaces.Terminal.IMyTerminalAction.Action
member.summary: This is the action taken when an action is performed.

member.name: P:Sandbox.ModAPI.Interfaces.Terminal.IMyTerminalAction.Writer
member.summary: This allows you to set the "Icon Text" of an action (the text that appears under the icon in the toolbar)

member.name: T:Sandbox.ModAPI.Interfaces.Terminal.IMyTerminalControl
member.summary: This is the base terminal control interface. All controls implement this.

member.name: M:Sandbox.ModAPI.Interfaces.Terminal.IMyTerminalControl.RedrawControl
member.summary: Recreates the control GUI. This allows you to update the Title of some controls.

member.name: M:Sandbox.ModAPI.Interfaces.Terminal.IMyTerminalControl.UpdateVisual
member.summary: This updates a control that is currently displayed, allowing you to refresh it's state

member.name: P:Sandbox.ModAPI.Interfaces.Terminal.IMyTerminalControl.Id
member.summary: Identifier of control

member.name: P:Sandbox.ModAPI.Interfaces.Terminal.IMyTerminalControl.Enabled
member.summary: Allows you to set if the control is enabled

member.name: P:Sandbox.ModAPI.Interfaces.Terminal.IMyTerminalControl.Visible
member.summary: Allows you to set if the control is visible

member.name: P:Sandbox.ModAPI.Interfaces.Terminal.IMyTerminalControl.SupportsMultipleBlocks
member.summary: Allows you to set if the control is visible when the block is selected as a group

member.name: T:Sandbox.ModAPI.Interfaces.Terminal.IMyTerminalControlButton
member.summary: This is a control button. When a button is clicked an action is performed.

member.name: T:Sandbox.ModAPI.Interfaces.Terminal.IMyTerminalControlTitleTooltip
member.summary: This is a base interface for other interfaces. Almost all controls implement this, and allows you to set the label (Title) of the control and also the tooltip that appears when hovering over the control.

member.name: P:Sandbox.ModAPI.Interfaces.Terminal.IMyTerminalControlTitleTooltip.Title
member.summary: Allows you to get or set the Label that appears on the control

member.name: P:Sandbox.ModAPI.Interfaces.Terminal.IMyTerminalControlTitleTooltip.Tooltip
member.summary: Allows you to get or set the tooltip that appears when you hover over the control

member.name: P:Sandbox.ModAPI.Interfaces.Terminal.IMyTerminalControlButton.Action
member.summary: The action taken when a button is clicked

member.name: T:Sandbox.ModAPI.Interfaces.Terminal.IMyTerminalControlCheckbox
member.summary: This is a checkbox. A label appears and a box appears next to it

member.name: T:Sandbox.ModAPI.Interfaces.Terminal.IMyTerminalValueControl`1
member.summary: This is a value control interface that a few controls implement. When a value changes, the Setter action is performed. When a value is queried the Getter action is performed.

member.name: P:Sandbox.ModAPI.Interfaces.Terminal.IMyTerminalValueControl`1.Getter
member.summary: This is triggered when the value of the control is required.

member.name: P:Sandbox.ModAPI.Interfaces.Terminal.IMyTerminalValueControl`1.Setter
member.summary: This is triggered when the value of the control is set by the user. Depending on the control, this may be called a lot.

member.name: P:Sandbox.ModAPI.Interfaces.Terminal.IMyTerminalControlCheckbox.OnText
member.summary: The "on" label text

member.name: P:Sandbox.ModAPI.Interfaces.Terminal.IMyTerminalControlCheckbox.OffText
member.summary: The "off" label text

member.name: T:Sandbox.ModAPI.Interfaces.Terminal.IMyTerminalControlColor
member.summary: This is a color control. This terminal controls allows you to select colors.

member.name: T:Sandbox.ModAPI.Interfaces.Terminal.IMyTerminalControlCombobox
member.summary: This is a combobox control. It is a field that gives a drop down list that contains options that you can select.

member.name: P:Sandbox.ModAPI.Interfaces.Terminal.IMyTerminalControlCombobox.ComboBoxContent
member.summary: This allows you to set the content of the combo box itself.

member.name: T:Sandbox.ModAPI.Interfaces.Terminal.IMyTerminalControlLabel
member.summary: This is a simple label control.

member.name: P:Sandbox.ModAPI.Interfaces.Terminal.IMyTerminalControlLabel.Label
member.summary: The text on the label

member.name: T:Sandbox.ModAPI.Interfaces.Terminal.IMyTerminalControlListbox
member.summary: This is a list box. It contains a list of items that a user can select.

member.name: P:Sandbox.ModAPI.Interfaces.Terminal.IMyTerminalControlListbox.Multiselect
member.summary: This allows you to enable/disable multiple item selection

member.name: P:Sandbox.ModAPI.Interfaces.Terminal.IMyTerminalControlListbox.VisibleRowsCount
member.summary: This allows you to set how many rows are visible in the list box.

member.name: P:Sandbox.ModAPI.Interfaces.Terminal.IMyTerminalControlListbox.ListContent
member.summary: This is triggered when you need to populate the list with list items. The first list is the items in the list box, and the second list is the selected items in the list.

member.name: P:Sandbox.ModAPI.Interfaces.Terminal.IMyTerminalControlListbox.ItemSelected
member.summary: This is triggered when an item is selected. Can contain more than one item if Multiselect is true.

member.name: T:Sandbox.ModAPI.Interfaces.Terminal.IMyTerminalControlOnOffSwitch
member.summary: This is an on / off switch or toggle button. It gives two options that a user can toggled between.

member.name: P:Sandbox.ModAPI.Interfaces.Terminal.IMyTerminalControlOnOffSwitch.OnText
member.summary: The label for the "on" switch

member.name: P:Sandbox.ModAPI.Interfaces.Terminal.IMyTerminalControlOnOffSwitch.OffText
member.summary: The label for the "off" switch

member.name: T:Sandbox.ModAPI.Interfaces.Terminal.IMyTerminalControlProperty`1
member.summary: This is a control property. This is use to set properties on a block that can be referenced in the ProgrammableBlock.

member.name: T:Sandbox.ModAPI.Interfaces.Terminal.IMyTerminalControlSeparator
member.summary: This is a simple line separator used to separate controls in a visible manner.

member.name: T:Sandbox.ModAPI.Interfaces.Terminal.IMyTerminalControlSlider
member.summary: This is a value slider. A slider can be moved by a user and a value selected.

member.name: M:Sandbox.ModAPI.Interfaces.Terminal.IMyTerminalControlSlider.SetLimits(System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Allows you to set the upper and lower limits of the slider

member.name: M:Sandbox.ModAPI.Interfaces.Terminal.IMyTerminalControlSlider.SetLogLimits(System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Allows you to set the upper and lower limits of the slider, interpolating on a logarithmic scale

member.name: M:Sandbox.ModAPI.Interfaces.Terminal.IMyTerminalControlSlider.SetDualLogLimits(System.Single,System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Allows you to set the upper and lower limits of the slider, interpolating on a logarithmic scale at both ends

member.name: M:Sandbox.ModAPI.Interfaces.Terminal.IMyTerminalControlSlider.SetLimits(System.Func{Sandbox.ModAPI.IMyTerminalBlock,System.Single},System.Func{Sandbox.ModAPI.IMyTerminalBlock,System.Single})
member.summary: Allows you to set the upper and lower limits of the slider with delegates

member.name: M:Sandbox.ModAPI.Interfaces.Terminal.IMyTerminalControlSlider.SetLogLimits(System.Func{Sandbox.ModAPI.IMyTerminalBlock,System.Single},System.Func{Sandbox.ModAPI.IMyTerminalBlock,System.Single})
member.summary: Allows you to set the upper and lower limits of the slider with delegates, interpolating on a logarithmic scale

member.name: M:Sandbox.ModAPI.Interfaces.Terminal.IMyTerminalControlSlider.SetDualLogLimits(System.Func{Sandbox.ModAPI.IMyTerminalBlock,System.Single},System.Func{Sandbox.ModAPI.IMyTerminalBlock,System.Single},System.Single)
member.summary: Allows you to set the upper and lower limits of the slider with delegates, interpolating on a logarithmic scale at both ends

member.name: P:Sandbox.ModAPI.Interfaces.Terminal.IMyTerminalControlSlider.Writer
member.summary: This is triggered when a slider value is modified. Appending to the stringbuilder allows you to modify the text that is displayed along side the slider when it updates.

member.name: T:Sandbox.ModAPI.Interfaces.Terminal.IMyTerminalControlTextbox
member.summary: This is a textbox where a user can enter values into.

member.summary: This is entry point for entire scripting possibilities in game

member.summary: Event triggered on gui control created.

member.summary: IMyCubeBuilder represents building hand

member.name: F:Sandbox.ModAPI.MyAPIGateway.TerminalActionsHelper
member.summary: IMyTerminalActionsHelper is helper for terminal actions and allows to access terminal

member.name: F:Sandbox.ModAPI.MyAPIGateway.TerminalControls

member.summary: IMyMultiplayer contains multiplayer related things

member.summary: IMyPhysics contains physics related things (CastRay, etc.)

member.name: F:Sandbox.ModAPI.MyAPIGateway.Gui
member.summary: IMyGui exposes some useful values from the GUI systems

member.name: F:Sandbox.ModAPI.MyAPIGateway.IngameScripting
member.summary: Provides mod access to control compilation of ingame scripts

member.name: F:Sandbox.ModAPI.MyAPIGateway.Input
member.summary: IMyInput allows accessing direct input device states

member.name: P:Sandbox.ModAPI.MyAPIGateway.Session
member.summary: IMySession represents session object e.g. current world and its settings

member.name: P:Sandbox.ModAPI.MyAPIGateway.Entities
member.summary: IMyEntities represents all objects that currently in world

member.name: T:Sandbox.ModAPI.MyWhitelistTarget
member.summary: Determines what target a whitelisting entry does or should support.

member.name: F:Sandbox.ModAPI.MyWhitelistTarget.None
member.summary: No target. Depending on the context, this may mean no support at all or unrestricted support.

member.name: F:Sandbox.ModAPI.MyWhitelistTarget.ModApi
member.summary: The entry supports or must support ModAPI level entry.

member.name: F:Sandbox.ModAPI.MyWhitelistTarget.Ingame
member.summary: The entry supports or must support Ingame level entry.

member.name: F:Sandbox.ModAPI.MyWhitelistTarget.Both
member.summary: A shortcut flag meaning the entry supports or must support both ModAPI and Ingame level entries.
